post.body: Uh I kinda screwed up my ZeroMe a bit :S

comment.body: Hey.  If you're setting up a site, the best thing to do is to get peers, otherwise nobody can access it! Visit this Zite: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LtvsjbtQ2tY7SCtCZzC4KhErqEK3bXD4n and add your Zite to the list so that it can be seeded by a few people, though you might need to keep ZeroNet open for ~10-15 minutes afterwards.  It's really useful for getting started and it'll allow people to visit your Zite while you're offline! :) This should fix the "NO PEERS FOUND" issue, and allow everyone to see what your Zite contains.  I'll also add the Zite to Bwoi if you so wish.  Have a nice day! :)
Does this offer any advantage over the Python version of ZeroNet?
@Sirenyc: ZeroGo is a Golang port of ZeroNet, which is written in Python.
Me too.  Great game, well worth the money and time invested, absolutely loved the ending, hope there's a third game :)
glad to see bwoi got a mention thanks
